006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionLibrary;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDurationItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INcNameItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INonNegativeIntegerItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IPositiveIntegerItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
023
024/**
025 * Provides built-in Metapath functions based on the XPath 3.1
026 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/">function
027 * specification</a>.
028 */
029@SuppressWarnings({ "removal" })
030@SuppressFBWarnings("UWF_UNWRITTEN_FIELD")
031public class DefaultFunctionLibrary
032    extends FunctionLibrary {
033
034  /**
035   * Initialize the built-in function library.
036   */
037  public DefaultFunctionLibrary() { // NOPMD - intentional
038    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-abs
039    registerFunction(FnAbs.SIGNATURE);
040    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-adjust-dateTime-to-timezone
041    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-adjust-date-to-timezone
042    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-adjust-time-to-timezone
043    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-avg
044    registerFunction(FnAvg.SIGNATURE);
045    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-base-uri
046    registerFunction(FnBaseUri.SIGNATURE_NO_ARG);
047    registerFunction(FnBaseUri.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
048    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-boolean
049    registerFunction(FnBoolean.SIGNATURE);
050    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-ceiling
051    registerFunction(FnCeiling.SIGNATURE);
052    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-compare
053    registerFunction(FnCompare.SIGNATURE);
054    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-concat
055    registerFunction(FnConcat.SIGNATURE);
056    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-contains
057    registerFunction(FnContains.SIGNATURE);
058    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-count
059    registerFunction(FnCount.SIGNATURE);
060    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-current-date
061    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-current-dateTime
062    registerFunction(FnCurrentDateTime.SIGNATURE);
063    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-current-time
064    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-data
065    registerFunction(FnData.SIGNATURE_NO_ARG);
066    registerFunction(FnData.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
067    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-day-from-date
068    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-day-from-dateTime
069    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-days-from-duration
070    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-deep-equal
071    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-distinct-values
072    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc
073    registerFunction(FnDoc.SIGNATURE);
074    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc-available
075    registerFunction(FnDocumentAvailable.SIGNATURE);
076    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-document-uri
077    registerFunction(FnDocumentUri.SIGNATURE_NO_ARG);
078    registerFunction(FnDocumentUri.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
079    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-empty
080    registerFunction(FnEmpty.SIGNATURE);
081    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-encode-for-uri
082    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-ends-with
083    registerFunction(FnEndsWith.SIGNATURE);
084    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-exactly-one
085    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-exists
086    registerFunction(FnExists.SIGNATURE);
087    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-false
088    registerFunction(FnFalse.SIGNATURE);
089    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-floor
090    registerFunction(NumericFunction.signature(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS, "floor", INumericItem::floor));
091    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-format-date
092    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-format-dateTime
093    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-format-integer
094    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-format-number
095    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-format-time
096    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-generate-id
097    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-has-children
098    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-head
099    registerFunction(FnHead.SIGNATURE);
100    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-hours-from-dateTime
101    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-hours-from-duration
102    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-hours-from-time
103    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-implicit-timezone
104    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-index-of
105    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-innermost
106    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-insert-before
107    registerFunction(FnInsertBefore.SIGNATURE);
108    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-iri-to-uri
109    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-last
110    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-lower-case
111    registerFunction(FnLowerCase.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
112    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-matches
113    registerFunction(FnMatches.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
114    registerFunction(FnMatches.SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG);
115    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-max
116    registerFunction(FnMinMax.SIGNATURE_MAX);
117    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-min
118    registerFunction(FnMinMax.SIGNATURE_MIN);
119    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-minutes-from-dateTime
120    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-minutes-from-duration
121    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-minutes-from-time
122    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-month-from-date
123    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-month-from-dateTime
124    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-months-from-duration
125    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-node-name
126    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-normalize-space
127    registerFunction(FnNormalizeSpace.SIGNATURE_NO_ARG);
128    registerFunction(FnNormalizeSpace.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
129    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-normalize-unicode
130    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-not
131    registerFunction(FnNot.SIGNATURE);
132    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-number
133    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-one-or-more
134    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-outermost
135    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-parse-ietf-date
136    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-path
137    registerFunction(FnPath.SIGNATURE_NO_ARG);
138    registerFunction(FnPath.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
139    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-position
140    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-remove
141    registerFunction(FnRemove.SIGNATURE);
142    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-replace
143    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-resolve-uri
144    registerFunction(FnResolveUri.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
145    registerFunction(FnResolveUri.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
146    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-reverse
147    registerFunction(FnReverse.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
148    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-root
149    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-round
150    registerFunction(FnRound.SIGNATURE);
151    registerFunction(FnRound.SIGNATURE_WITH_PRECISION);
152    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-round-half-to-even
153    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-seconds-from-dateTime
154    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-seconds-from-duration
155    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-seconds-from-time
156    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-starts-with
157    registerFunction(FnStartsWith.SIGNATURE);
158    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-static-base-uri
159    registerFunction(FnStaticBaseUri.SIGNATURE);
160    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-string
161    registerFunction(FnString.SIGNATURE_NO_ARG);
162    registerFunction(FnString.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
163    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-30/#func-substring
164    registerFunction(FnSubstring.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
165    registerFunction(FnSubstring.SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG);
166    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-string-join
167    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-string-length
168    registerFunction(FnStringLength.SIGNATURE_NO_ARG);
169    registerFunction(FnStringLength.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
170    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subsequence
171    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-substring-after
172    registerFunction(FnSubstringAfter.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
173    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-substring-before
174    registerFunction(FnSubstringBefore.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
175    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-sum
176    registerFunction(FnSum.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
177    registerFunction(FnSum.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
178    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-tail
179    registerFunction(FnTail.SIGNATURE);
180    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-timezone-from-date
181    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-timezone-from-dateTime
182    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-timezone-from-time
183    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-tokenize
184    registerFunction(FnTokenize.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
185    registerFunction(FnTokenize.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
186    registerFunction(FnTokenize.SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG);
187    // P1: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-translate
188    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-true
189    registerFunction(FnTrue.SIGNATURE);
190    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-unparsed-text
191    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-unparsed-text-available
192    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-unparsed-text-lines
193    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-upper-case
194    registerFunction(FnUpperCase.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
195    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-year-from-date
196    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-year-from-dateTime
197    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-years-from-duration
198    // P2: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-zero-or-one
199
200    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-get
201    registerFunction(ArrayGet.SIGNATURE);
202    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-size
203    registerFunction(ArraySize.SIGNATURE);
204    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-put
205    registerFunction(ArrayPut.SIGNATURE);
206    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-append
207    registerFunction(ArrayAppend.SIGNATURE);
208    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray
209    registerFunction(ArraySubarray.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
210    registerFunction(ArraySubarray.SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG);
211    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-remove
212    registerFunction(ArrayRemove.SIGNATURE);
213    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-insert-before
214    registerFunction(ArrayInsertBefore.SIGNATURE);
215    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-head
216    registerFunction(ArrayHead.SIGNATURE);
217    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-tail
218    registerFunction(ArrayTail.SIGNATURE);
219    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-reverse
220    registerFunction(ArrayReverse.SIGNATURE);
221    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-join
222    registerFunction(ArrayJoin.SIGNATURE);
223    // P3: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-for-each
224    // P3: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-filter
225    // P3: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-fold-left
226    // P3: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-fold-right
227    // P3: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-for-each-pair
228    // P3: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-sort
229    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-flatten
230    registerFunction(ArrayFlatten.SIGNATURE);
231
232    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-merge
233    registerFunction(MapMerge.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
234    registerFunction(MapMerge.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
235    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-size
236    registerFunction(MapSize.SIGNATURE);
237    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-keys
238    registerFunction(MapKeys.SIGNATURE);
239    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-contains
240    registerFunction(MapContains.SIGNATURE);
241    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-get
242    registerFunction(MapGet.SIGNATURE);
243    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find
244    registerFunction(MapFind.SIGNATURE);
245    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-put
246    registerFunction(MapPut.SIGNATURE);
247    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-entry
248    registerFunction(MapEntry.SIGNATURE);
249    // https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-remove
250    registerFunction(MapRemove.SIGNATURE);
251    // P3: https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-for-each
252
253    // // xpath casting functions
254    // registerFunction(
255    // CastFunction.signature(MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "boolean",
256    // IBooleanItem.class, IBooleanItem::cast));
257    // registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
258    // MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "date", IDateItem.class, IDateItem::cast));
259    // registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
260    // MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "dateTime", IDateTimeItem.class,
261    // IDateTimeItem::cast));
262    // registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
263    // MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "decimal", IDecimalItem.class,
264    // IDecimalItem::cast));
265    // registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
266    // MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "duration", IDurationItem.class,
267    // IDurationItem::cast));
268    // registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
269    // MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "integer", IIntegerItem.class,
270    // IIntegerItem::cast));
271    // registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
272    // MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "NCName", INcNameItem.class,
273    // INcNameItem::cast));
274    // registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
275    // MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "nonNegativeInteger",
276    // INonNegativeIntegerItem.class,
277    // INonNegativeIntegerItem::cast));
278    // registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
279    // MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "positiveInteger",
280    // IPositiveIntegerItem.class,
281    // IPositiveIntegerItem::cast));
282    // registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
283    // MetapathConstants.NS_XML_SCHEMA, "string", IStringItem.class,
284    // IStringItem::cast));
285
286    // metapath casting functions
287    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
288        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "boolean", IBooleanItem.class, IBooleanItem::cast));
289    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
290        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "date", IDateItem.class, IDateItem::cast));
291    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
292        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "date-time", IDateTimeItem.class, IDateTimeItem::cast));
293    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
294        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "decimal", IDecimalItem.class, IDecimalItem::cast));
295    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
296        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "duration", IDurationItem.class, IDurationItem::cast));
297    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
298        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "integer", IIntegerItem.class, IIntegerItem::cast));
299    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
300        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "ncname", INcNameItem.class, INcNameItem::cast));
301    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
302        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "non-negative-integer", INonNegativeIntegerItem.class,
303        INonNegativeIntegerItem::cast));
304    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
305        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "positive-integer", IPositiveIntegerItem.class,
306        IPositiveIntegerItem::cast));
307    registerFunction(CastFunction.signature(
308        MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "string", IStringItem.class, IStringItem::cast));
309
310    // extra functions
311    registerFunction(MpRecurseDepth.SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG);
312    registerFunction(MpRecurseDepth.SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG);
313  }
314}
